Major_Arcs.title: Introduction of The Human Meteor and Initial Threat
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces the main character, The Human Meteor, his alter ego Duke O'Dowd, and the initial conflicts he faces, starting from a seemingly normal taxi driving day to an unexpected ambush.

sub_scenes.title: Cover Introduction and Premise Setup
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene is the cover page which introduces the comic title, the main character, and the initial premise of Duke O'Dowd's secret identity and an underwater threat.

sub_scenes.title: Duke's Taxi Fare and the Waterfront Ambush
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Duke starting his day as a taxi driver, picking up wealthy passengers, getting followed by G-Man Holden, and then being attacked at the pier, leading to his transformation.

narrative_arcs.title: Pursuit and Ambush at the Pier

sub_scenes.title: Human Meteor's Intervention and Initial Victory
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows Human Meteor confronting and subduing the attackers at the pier, followed by police arrival and praise, and his brief recovery.

Major_Arcs.title: Yacht Investigation and Underwater Mission
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc shifts the focus to a new threat involving a yacht and a submarine, prompting Human Meteor to investigate and engage in underwater action.

sub_scenes.title: Hospital Briefing and Yacht Infiltration Plan
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene begins with a briefing at the hospital, introducing the yacht and G-Man Holden's capture, leading to Duke's plan to infiltrate the yacht.

sub_scenes.title: Toby's Undercover Mission and Submarine Discovery
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details Toby's undercover actions on the yacht, his discovery of the submarine and depth map, and his capture and subsequent reveal of his true mission.

narrative_arcs.title: Return, Submarine Discovery, and Mission Reveal

sub_scenes.title: Human Meteor's Underwater Confrontation and Submarine Attack
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Human Meteor's dive, submarine discovery, allied divers' arrival, enemy activities around the submarine, and the underwater fight leading to torpedo attack.

Major_Arcs.title: Surface Aftermath and Transition to New Mission
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc deals with the immediate surface aftermath of the underwater conflict, focusing on the ship, Peter's condition, and transitioning towards a new phase of the story.

sub_scenes.title: Shipboard Concerns and Geyser Event
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shifts to the ship, showing concern for Peter and the sudden eruption of a geyser, creating a new point of alarm.

sub_scenes.title: Yacht Investigation and Peter's Map Discovery
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene sees Human Meteor boarding the yacht, discovering Peter, searching for the depth map, and informing the Navy, resolving the yacht investigation.

narrative_arcs.title: Informing the Navy about Peter's Map

sub_scenes.title: Transition and Domestic Scene
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene acts as a transition, with a speedboat journey, a hospital visit to Holden, and a domestic scene of bedtime for Toby, concluding the immediate action and shifting tone.

narrative_arcs.title: Evening Drive and Bedtime for Toby

Major_Arcs.title: Liberty Lads and the Ambulance Mystery
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces a new storyline with the Liberty Lads in combat and transitions to a street scene involving an ambulance and a mysterious wallet.

sub_scenes.title: Liberty Lads Combat Scene
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene presents an action sequence with the Liberty Lads fighting Nazi fiends, unrelated to the Human Meteor story.

sub_scenes.title: Ambulance Arrival and Wallet Clue
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shifts to a street setting with boys observing an ambulance and then discovering a dropped wallet, setting up a new mystery.

narrative_arcs.title: Wallet Discovery and Bus Garage Clue

sub_scenes.title: Bus Garage and Major Bronson Encounter
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene follows the boys to the bus garage where they witness a marine saluting a civilian, Major Bronson, adding a layer of intrigue.

Major_Arcs.title: Bus Garage Confrontation and Nazi Spy Ring Resolution
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on the boys' encounter at the bus garage, their confrontation with Mr. Horst, Major Bronson's intervention, and the resolution of a Nazi spy ring threat.

sub_scenes.title: Pursuit to Bus Garage and Initial Interaction
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows the boys chasing the bus, being intercepted by a policeman, and then being taken to Mr. Horst's office.

narrative_arcs.title: Chasing the Bus for Wallet Return

sub_scenes.title: Mr. Horst's Threat and Bronson's Intervention
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details Mr. Horst's menacing behavior towards the boys, his interrogation, and the violent plan overheard, leading to Major Bronson's dramatic intervention.

narrative_arcs.title: Waiting on the Bench and Approaching Threat

sub_scenes.title: Bronson's Fight and Marine Intervention
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the chaotic fight, the boys' capture, Horst's threat, Bronson's lethal action, and the henchmen's retaliation, culminating in the boys seeking marine help.

narrative_arcs.title: Initial Melee and Call to Stop

sub_scenes.title: Escape and Marine Barracks Attack
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows the boys escaping to seek marine help, one boy discovering secret plans, and the dramatic attack on the Marine Barracks.

narrative_arcs.title: Seeking Marine Help at the Waterfront
Discovery and Confrontation in the Secret Office

sub_scenes.title: Barracks Chaos and Nazi Confrontation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the chaos at the barracks, Skip's defense, and the direct confrontation between Nazis and Major Bronson, revealing the attackers' identity.

sub_scenes.title: Marine Rescue and Nazi Spy Ring Resolution
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene concludes the major arc with the Marines intervening, combatting the Nazis, addressing Major Bronson's injury, and ultimately resolving the Nazi spy ring threat.

narrative_arcs.title: Resolution and Congratulations for Stopping Nazi Spies

Major_Arcs.title: Champ and Henry in South American Intrigue
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces Champ and Henry in a new adventure set in South America, involving political intrigue, kidnapping, and confrontations with Axis agents.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction to South American Setting and Kidnapping
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces Champ and Henry, sets the scene in South America, and establishes the kidnapping of Rosita by El Tigre, suspected Axis agent.

narrative_arcs.title: Introduction of Champ and Henry in Intrigue

sub_scenes.title: Officers' Suspicious Actions and Expulsion
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the officers' actions, including arrests, questioning civilians, and expelling individuals from town, creating an atmosphere of suspicion and control.

sub_scenes.title: Champ and Henry's Inquiry and Explanation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows Champ and Henry being escorted, questioning officers about their interrogation, and receiving an explanation about Rosita's kidnapping and El Tigre's involvement.

narrative_arcs.title: Escort to Consul and Investigation Inquiry
Explanation of Rosita's Kidnapping and Suspicion

sub_scenes.title: Capture by El Tigre and Mama's House
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts El Tigre's plot being discussed, Champ and Henry being captured by El Tigre, and taken to a house where they meet 'Mama'.

sub_scenes.title: Rescue Mission Planning and Infiltration
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details the planning of the rescue mission for Rosita, the infiltration of El Tigre's hideout, and the use of stage dollars as a diversion.

narrative_arcs.title: Planning the Approach to El Tigre
Approaching Guards and Confrontation with El Tigre

sub_scenes.title: Misunderstanding and Rosita's Rescue
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene involves the interrogation of a man, the search for Rosita, clarification about El Tigre's role, and the initiation of the rescue mission for Rosita.

narrative_arcs.title: Interrogation and Twist Regarding Axis Agents
Misunderstanding and Clarification about El Tigre
Rosita's Location Revealed and Rescue Mission Initiated

sub_scenes.title: Rescue Operation and Resolution
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the execution of the rescue mission, including pursuit, infiltration, combat, finding Rosita, and the final resolution with gratitude and series promotion.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival of Government Forces and Manhunt

Major_Arcs.title: Devil Dog Dolan in Jungle Adventure
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows Devil Dog Dolan in a jungle setting, involving combat, military briefings, capture, torture, and a final resolution involving native tribes and a pursuit of Grauer.

sub_scenes.title: Jungle Combat and Military Briefing
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces Devil Dog Dolan in jungle combat, followed by a military briefing discussing his actions and disobedience.

narrative_arcs.title: Jungle Combat and Introduction of Devil Dog Dolan
Reassurance and Trust in Dolan's Intentions

sub_scenes.title: Jungle Arrival and Ambush
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Dolan's arrival in the jungle, observation, growing unease, a hidden threat, and finally an ambush and capture of another character.

sub_scenes.title: Capture, Torture, and Plans Handover
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene focuses on the captured soldier being brought before Grauer, suspicion about Dolan, interrogation orders, torture, and the eventual handover of the plans.

sub_scenes.title: Arson, Marine Attack, and Grauer's Orders
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts arson, a marine attack, justification for action, Grauer's post-incident orders, and the visual consequence of burning huts.

narrative_arcs.title: Marine's Attack and Attempt to Stop Him
Burning Native Huts and Flames' Surge

sub_scenes.title: Dolan's Attack, Chief's Death, and New Objective
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene concludes Dolan's jungle adventure with his surprise attack, the fight leading to the chief's accidental death, native homage, explanation of betrayal, and setting up a new objective to pursue Grauer.

narrative_arcs.title: Arsonist's Gloating and Reassurance to Sam
Chief's Death and Native Homage to Marine
Explanation of Chief's Betrayal and Liberation
Post-Conflict Dialogue and Pursuit of Grauer

sub_scenes.title: Captain's Dilemma and Sam's Onslaught and Resolution
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the Captain's dilemma, the reveal of Sam as his son, Sam's aggressive reaction and fight, and the eventual resolution with order rescinded and disciplinary action by Dolan.

Major_Arcs.title: Twinkle Twins and the Murder Mystery
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces the Twinkle Twins and their investigation into a murder mystery, involving newspaper assignments, hospital visits, and pursuit of justice.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction to Twinkle Twins and Murder Assignment
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces the Twinkle Twins and sets up their new case: the murder of banker Robert Burgess, assigned by Elijah at the newspaper office.

narrative_arcs.title: The News Assignment and Initial Clues

sub_scenes.title: Hospital Investigation and Reilly's Sick Child
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene follows Dan and Diane to the police station and then the hospital, where they investigate Tom Reilly's sick child as a lead in the murder case.

narrative_arcs.title: Hospital Investigation and Miss Reilly's Condition

sub_scenes.title: Racketeering Suspicion and Phone Call to Elijah
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene focuses on Diane's suspicion about Barnacci and Dan's decision to call Elijah for more information, shifting the investigation's direction.

narrative_arcs.title: Phoning Elijah from the Candy Store

sub_scenes.title: Search in Irish Section and Mrs. Murphy's Information
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene follows Dan and Diane to the Irish section, where they inquire about Tom Reilly and are invited in by Mrs. Murphy, who provides crucial information.

narrative_arcs.title: Seeking Tom Reilly in the Irish Section
Farnacci's Blood Transfusion and Mob Threat

sub_scenes.title: Reilly's Escape and Armed Confrontation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Reilly's escape attempt, Dan and Diane's pursuit, the roadblock, and the armed confrontation on top of cars.

sub_scenes.title: Street Brawl, Police Intervention, and Vehicle Apprehension
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene briefly diverts to a street brawl, police intervention, and then returns to the car chase aftermath with police apprehending the vehicles.

sub_scenes.title: Medical Emergency and Community Blood Donation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene focuses on the medical emergency, starting with the transport of the shooting victim, ambulance ride, hospital arrival, diagnosis, blood type mismatch, community appeal for blood, and the arrival of donors.

narrative_arcs.title: Diagnosis: Blood Transfusion Needed for Mrs. Murphy
Seeking Blood Donors and Initial Mismatch
Urgent Call for Blood Donors for Tom Reilly
Community Response and Arrival of Blood Donors
Blood Type Verification and Donation Process
Blood Transfusion and Tom Reilly's Recovery
Anticipation of Tom Reilly Revealing Information

sub_scenes.title: Justice for Farnacci and Birthday Party Resolution
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene concludes the Twinkle Twins mystery with demands for justice against Farnacci, police action to arrest him, confrontation at the poolroom, and finally, a celebratory birthday party for Reilly's daughter, marking a happy resolution.

narrative_arcs.title: Demand for Justice and Plan to Capture Farnacci
Police Pursuit and Raid to Arrest Farnacci
Confrontation and Apprehension at the Poolroom
Celebratory Birthday Party for Reilly's Daughter
